View My Work

I Specialize in

Web development and UI/UX layouts for websites

Full Stack Development

Proficient in creating dynamic and responsive websites using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), with a focus on backend-to-frontend integration.

SEO Analysis

Experienced in optimizing website visibility and search engine rankings through comprehensive SEO strategies and analytics tools.

Modern Web Technologies

Skilled in utilizing advanced tools such as Redux for state management, along with proficiency in JavaScript, Bootstrap, and Tailwind for front-end development.

Version Control and Collaboration:

Adept at using git and GitHub for version control, code sharing, and collaborative project work.

My creative process

All of my UI/UX and design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Goal Identification

Establishing the purpose of the website and the objectives it needs to fulfill.

2

Scope Definition

Determining the features and web pages required to achieve the goals within a set timeline.

3

Sitemap and Wireframe

Outlining the site architecture and how the content and features will interrelate.

4

Content Creation

Developing content for individual pages with a focus on SEO to maintain topic relevance.
